text: This article originally appears in the October 2017 issue of ELLE. You may think that personal style is a wholly subjective gift : You know it when you see it, sure, but when it comes to choosing who does it best... how do you decide? For our annual personal style awards, we took a democratic approach, enlisting 17 style luminaries — designers, actors, industry players, and more — to tell us who ’ s really got it going on. Here, we bring you the result : 12 genre - smashing sartorial heavyweights whose wardrobes telegraph an eye for beauty, a fearless knack for statement - making, and a deep streak of individuality. The Rebel With a Cause Paris Jackson | Model ; Actress Cotton tank, $ 490, Saint Laurent by Anthony Vac
